abstract: Scott Dixon wins pole position at IndyCar race in Lexington, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: Scott Dixon looked as dominant as ever at Mid-Ohio, winning the pole for the IndyCar race there and setting a track record in the process.

headline.main: Dixon Claims IndyCar Pole at Mid-Ohio
headline.print_headline: Dixon Claims IndyCar Pole at Mid-Ohio

snippet: Scott Dixon looked as dominant as ever at Mid-Ohio, winning the pole for the IndyCar race there and setting a track record in the process.
